item.description:
Tuesday, 7pm FDIY Training Center, 1 Industrial Dr., Windham, NH

Tuesday night you will:

  • Network with local business pros
  • Learn how 90 for life can help you
    • Get healthy
    • Lose Weight
    • Create an additional stream of income
    • Get out of Debt 

We have the answer to financial and physical wellness with Youngevity and 90for LIFE!  There is nothing better than helping people get healthy and wealthy all why you are getting healthy and wealthy!

Overview followed by a short training!  To listen to Dr. Joel Wallach's Dead Doctors Don't Lie - visit - https://traftonbernadette.wordpress.com/dead-doctors-dont-lie/

RSVP with Bernadette at 603-834-4587 or dette101@gmail.com to attend for free.

Learn why My tax guy says that EVERYONE should own a home based business...here's why - http://wp.me/pNfNP-2A
item.how_to_find_us: Middle entrance - training center door, upstairs

group.name: Your Bridge to health and wealth
